an10.135:0.3: 135. The Teaching of the Noble Ones
an10.135:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the noble ones, and what is not the teaching of the noble ones. …
an10.135:1.3: And what is not the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.135:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.135:1.5: This is called what is not the teaching of the noble ones.
an10.135:1.6: And what is the teaching of the noble ones?
an10.135:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.135:1.8: This is called the teaching of the noble ones.”
